description.value:
The monk gives a sharp blow to the back of a foeâ€™s head. The critical threat range and critical multiplier of this strike increase by 1, and the monk gains a +2 bonus on attack rolls to confirm a critical hit with this strike. This increase is not doubled by @Compendium[pf1.feats.TbOPtIL8Fv8obXtP]{Improved Critical} or similar effects. Creatures without a discernible head are unaffected by this style strike (subject to GM discretion).

The monk must attack with a fist to use this style strike.
